title: Google TV will soon be able to cast content from multiple services from a single app
content:
The vision of Google TV is to make streaming your favorite shows effortless by keeping everything in one place. The Google TV app is now building on that idea by delivering support for casting content from multiple streaming services through a single app.

moreâ€¦

The post Google TV will soon be able to cast content from multiple services from a single app appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google TV app is adding support for casting content from multiple streaming services from a single app, coming later this year.
